name: Healthy Shrimp Scampi with Zoodles
author: Bren
summary: Shrimp, garlic, lemon, and a few other pantry items make this a quick weeknight meal. Make a side salad while the shrimp are marinating and you will have dinner on the table in an hour.
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
½ pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Mix 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 garlic clove, dried parsley, black pepper, and red pepper flakes together in a small bowl; mix well
Add shrimp, turn to coat, and refrigerate for 30 minutes
Cut off the ends of the zucchini and use a spiralizer on the thinnest setting to create the zoodles
Heat remaining olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat
Saute shallot for 3 minutes; add remaining garlic and cook for an additional 30 seconds
Add shrimp and cook until bright pink on the outside and meat is opaque, about 2 minutes per side
Add lemon juice, wine, lemon zest, and salt
Remove the skillet from heat and add zucchini; stir for 2 to 3 minutes
The residual heat will cook the zucchini
Divide onto 2 plates, top with fresh parsley, and serve
